TopicTitle: Hello I'm new, and need some basic help.

Articles.Content: I didn't read the tutorial that good...And i don't know how to turn the engines off and back on...I just know how to launch and everything with the spacebar

Hello, and welcome to the forums. Usually these types of answers are better suited for the How To forum, but engines cannot be turned off once turned on. Except for liquid fuel, which can be set to 0 throttle.

If you forgot how to adjust the throttle: Our wiki has a listing of Key Bindings.

And welcome aboard!
